contents.text: Thank you for calling Cadence Design Systems in South Bay, delivering industry-leading hardware and computer vision design enablement solutions.
For assistance with our electronic design automation tools, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical specialist for EDA tools support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a simulation error in my EDA tools so I can resume my design work immediately
As a veteran engineer, I'm getting a license activation error in Allegro PCB Editor and need help resolving it.
Debug Spectre simulation convergence errors in my transistor-level design environment.
I need help updating and troubleshooting my electronic design automation software on my computer.
I’m encountering errors in my Cadence EDA simulation and need technical support.

contents.text: For help with system design IP and integration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical specialist for IP solutions.

navigationGoals: Get guidance on integrating a PCIe IP block into my system design without further delays
I'm integrating a secure IP core into my SoC design and need guidance on the setup process.
Integrate a Tensilica Xtensa DSP core into my custom SoC IP flow.
I need guidance on integrating a system design IP into my current project.
I need help configuring and integrating a Cadence IP block into my system design.

contents.text: For sales, licensing, and account services, press 2.
If you would like to inquire about purchasing new licenses, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for new license inquiries.

navigationGoals: Purchase an additional license for Spectre simulation today
I'm looking to purchase an additional Virtuoso license for my veteran-owned consulting business.
Get a quote for 10 additional Allegro PCB Designer licenses.
I want to purchase a new license for your design tools and need help choosing the right one.
I’d like to purchase a new license for Cadence’s PCB/EDA tools as a student.

contents.text: For questions about existing orders or account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account management team.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my recent license renewal invoice and update my billing details
I need to check the status of my license renewal order and update my account billing information.
Check the status of my annual Virtuoso license renewal order.
I need to check the status of my existing license order and update my account details.
I want to check on my existing license renewal and update my account information.
